dict.acceptation: 有利条件；益处；优越（性）；处于支配地位；
有利于；有益于；促进；使处于有利地位；

sent.orig: At the same time has a significant size advantage, technological advantage, brand advantage and market advantage.
sent.trans: 同时公司拥有显著的规模优势、技术优势、品牌优势和市场开拓优势。

sent.orig: Traditional comparative advantage went through three steps: absolute advantage, comparative advantage and factor endowment theory.
sent.trans: 传统比较优势理论经历了三个阶段：绝对优势理论、比较优势理论和要素禀赋理论。

sent.orig: The Bonded Port Zone will develop logistics through their policy advantage, function advantage, and position advantage.
sent.trans: 保税港区将利用它的政策优势、功能优势，以及区位优势，大力发展港区物流业。

sent.orig: Competitive Advantage: does the company a sustainable competitive advantage?
sent.trans: 竞争优势：公司是否有可持续的竞争优势？

sent.orig: The related theory on comparative advantage and the comparative advantage trap is reviewed.
sent.trans: 首先回顾了“比较优势”及“比较优势陷阱”的相关理论。
